Text:
Something is not kosher with this upload...

i know he's VIP and all, but when i started to dl it there was an immediate boost to 500+ kb/s for about 10 seconds then EVERYTHING died- all my other downloads AND uploads. No, it wasn't my connection. soon as i removed the torrent i swept my comp and it all started up again

odd part was i couldn't find anything malicious, so either the most improbable coincidence or something's up... anyone else able to comment on this?
zackismet, I got the same thing. All my torrents stopped.

No problems here.
A=10
V=10
M=7

Don't forget to use PeerGuardian 2.
I agree. What the hell, very strange indeed. Nothing works, upload/download is very slow and utorrent hangs.
peerblock + a BOGON list should rrsolv problems described above
